name: guard-split
caption: Guard Split

effect.short: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
effect.full: Averages the user's unmodified [Defense]{mechanic:defense} with the target's unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pok√©mon. Unmodified [Special Defense]{mechanic:special-defense} is averaged the same way.

flavorText:
The user employs its psychic power to average its
Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
